termination_event_details.description: If the Purchaser is subject to an Involuntary Termination within 12 months after the Change in Control, then the Right of Repurchase shall lapse with respect to 25% of any remaining Restricted Shares.

If the Purchaser is subject to an Involuntary Termination within 12 months after the Change in Control, then the Right of Repurchase shall lapse with respect to 50% of any remaining Restricted Shares.

If the Purchaser is subject to an Involuntary Termination within 12 months after the Change in Control, then the Right of Repurchase shall lapse with respect to 100% of any remaining Restricted Shares.
If the Purchaser is subject to an Involuntary Termination any time after the Change in Control, then the Right of Repurchase shall lapse with respect to 25% of any remaining Restricted Shares.
If the Purchaser is subject to an Involuntary Termination any time after the Change in Control, then the Right of Repurchase shall lapse with respect to 50% of any remaining Restricted Shares.
If the Purchaser is subject to an Involuntary Termination any time after the Change in Control, then the Right of Repurchase shall lapse with respect to 100% of any remaining Restricted Shares.
